markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Tomb Raider](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3474)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Great treasure awaits those willing to explore the hazardous depths of ancient tombs and forgotten dungeons. Some tomb raiders seek the riches of bygone eras; others recover pieces of history thought lost to the sands of time.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 20

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 15
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 5">[Tomb Raider](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3474)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=627" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [NPC Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=236) pg. 56

**Perception** +13

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=34) +13, [Architecture Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) +11, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) +13, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=38) +7, [Engineering Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) +11, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47) +9, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=48) +11, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=50) +13

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +4

**Con** +1

**Int** +2

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Hazard Spotter** Even if the tomb raider isn't [Searching](/Actions.aspx?ID=2630), they get a check to find traps that normally require them to be Searching.

**Items**
[Climbing Kit](/Equipment.aspx?ID=14), [Hand Crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=69) (20 bolts), [Kukri](/Weapons.aspx?ID=56)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 21 

**Fort** +10 

**Ref** +15 

**Will** +11 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 75

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, climb 15 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
kukri +15 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)),
**Damage** 1d6+9 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +15 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 1d4+9 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
hand crossbow +15 ([range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d6+6 piercing

**Trick Attack** <actions string="Single Action" />  The tomb raider chooses one of their weapons. The next attack with that weapon this turn deals an additional 2d6 precision damage. In addition, the tomb raider can Interact to draw or reload the weapon.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-537" />
name: Tomb Raider

text: Tomb Raider Great treasure awaits those willing to explore the hazardous depths of ancient tombs and forgotten dungeons. Some tomb raiders seek the riches of bygone eras; others recover pieces of history thought lost to the sands of time. Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 20 Unspecific Lore : DC 18 Specific Lore : DC 15 Tomb Raider Source NPC Core pg. 56 Perception +13 Languages Common Skills Acrobatics +13, Architecture Lore +11, Athletics +13, Deception +7, Engineering Lore +11, Society +9, Stealth +11, Thievery +13 Str +3 Dex +4 Con +1 Int +2 Wis +2 Cha +0 Hazard Spotter Even if the tomb raider isn't Searching, they get a check to find traps that normally require them to be Searching. Items Climbing Kit, Hand Crossbow (20 bolts), Kukri --- AC 21 Fort +10 Ref +15 Will +11 HP 75 --- Speed 25 feet, climb 15 feet Melee Single Action kukri +15 (Agile, Trip), Damage 1d6+9 slashing Melee Single Action fist +15 (Agile, Finesse, Nonlethal, Unarmed), Damage 1d4+9 bludgeoning Ranged Single Action hand crossbow +15 (range increment 60 feet, reload 1), Damage 1d6+6 piercing Trick Attack Single Action The tomb raider chooses one of their weapons. The next attack with that weapon this turn deals an additional 2d6 precision damage. In addition, the tomb raider can Interact to draw or reload the weapon.
